conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: Ko wai ahau? Ko Jim ahau

conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: Tekau ma rua tau matou e mahi tahi ana, he katakata a Dwight

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: Ehara koe i a Jim, ehara a Jim i te Ahia

conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: Kaore koe i tino mohio? Hei. Tena koe mo te kore e kite whakataetae

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: Tena ra Jim, He aha koe te korero mai ai ki ahau mo tera hokonga i mahia e koe inanahi?

conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: Te Whanganui-a-Tara? I hokona atu ki a ratou nga kete 10 o nga taonga reta 24-pauna. I korero ranei koe mo Krieger-Murphy?

conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: Na te mea kare ano au i kati i tera engari kei te tumanako ahau kua tae mai he reta reo mai i a Paul Krieger e tatari ana ki ahau

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: I pehea koe i mohio ai? Kao kao kao. He korero tairongo tera mo nga kaimahi anake, kaua mo nga tangata o waho

conversation1.name: Jim
conversation1.dialogue: I tapahia e Dwight kei te ngana ahau ki te mahi i konei

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: Kaore koe e mahi i konei! Ehara koe i a Jim!

conversation1.name: Dwight
conversation1.dialogue: Kare au e mohio ko wai koe, engari ehara koe i a Jim, ko Jim tenei! Aue taku-
